items.content_html: Multilevel dropdown menus are a staple of web design. With the ability to provide multiple options to select from, they make navigation bars dynamic and organized.

items.content_html: We will be working with a simple meme generator app that is built on the class logic (state and lifecycle method). You will, however, learn how to manage this logic using the React Hooks in a function component.
